english.segment1: Glory so beautiful. The earth displays your majesty. How could you ever be. So mindful of someone as me
english.segment2: You captivate. Splendor I have never seen. Nothing else can compare. Youre infinite. Youre everywhere
english.segment3: Youre everything I cant explain. You set my heart on fire. And here I stand amazed. You take my breath away. You take my breath away
english.segment4: See me, all I am. These empty hands. Are all I can give. That You would die so Id live. Your sacrifice I cant believe
english.segment5: You fascinate. You stole my heart. I cant forget. And now that Ive felt your love. No turning back, I cant get enough
english.segment6: The morning breaks, my soul awakes. You are my one desire. And here I stand amazed. You take my breath away. You take my breath away
english.segment7: With just one word. With just one glance. Im lost in this divine romance. And every single day. More than I can say. You take my breath away
english.segment8: Oh, oh, oh. You take my breath away. Oh, oh, oh. You take my breath away. You take my breath away
